title: My game wont patch, pls halp!
body: my league client wont let me patch into the new update? It says "something is up with the servers and its preventing you from patching"  and its stuck on 107 MB left to go and it keeps on looping, anyone know whats wrong?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please download the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the default options selected, please upload the "LoL-Logs.zip" file that is created on your desktop to the host of your choice and reply with a link here.
